concept.title: 16-2. Authority to use the GPC for Non-Standard Ammunition (NSA) not from Army inventory

conbody.p: Per AR 5-13 paragraph 2-1b. and 2-7a(4), the Assistant Secretary of the Army (Acquisition, Logistics, and Technology), through the ODASA(P) and the Joint Program Executive Office Armaments and Ammunition (JPEO A&A), have implemented a waiver process (Figure 16-1) to procure small quantities of Army NSA for Armyâ€™s requirements not from Army inventory.
